modules.name: sampling_and_data
recommendedLiterature: Salganik, M. 2017. Bit by Bit: Social Research in the Digital Age. Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press.
Foster et al. 2020. Big Data and Social Science: A Practical Guide to Methods and Tools. 2nd Edition. Boca Raton, FL: CRC Press.

modules.name: advanced_software_engineering_software_testing_and_experimentation
recommendedLiterature: Paul Ammann & Jeff Offutt, Introduction to Software Testing, Cambridge University Press, January 2008.

modules.name: algorithmics
recommendedLiterature: Cormen, Leiserson, Rivest, Stein: Introduction to Algorithms, 3rd edition
Shimon Even: Graph Algorithms
Lovasz, Plummer: Matching Theory
modules.additionalPrerequisite: Practical Informatics I, Algorithms and Data Structures, Linear Algebra, Statistics

modules.name: model_driven_development
recommendedLiterature: Jos B. Warmer and Anneke G. Kleppe, The Object Constraint Language: Getting Your Models Ready for MDA, Addison-Wesley Object Technology Series, 2003.

modules.name: cryptography_ii
recommendedLiterature: Jonathan Katz, Yehuda Lindell: Introduction to Modern Cryptography: Principles and Protocols, Chapman and Hall/CRC, 2007.

modules.name: cryptography
recommendedLiterature: Christof Paar, Bart Preneel, Jan Pelzl: Understanding Cryptography: A Textbook for Students and Practitioners, Springer 2009.
Douglas R. Stinson: Cryptography - Theory and Practice, Taylor & Francis, 2005.
Alan G. Konheim: Cryptography: A Primer, John Wiley & Sons, 1981.
modules.additionalPrerequisite: Basis skills in linear algebra, probability theory, algorithms, and data structures

modules.name: types_and_programming_languages
recommendedLiterature: Types and Programming Languages. February 2002. Benjamin C. Pierce. The MIT Press.

modules.name: blockchain_security
modules.additionalPrerequisite: Knowledge in cryptography and/or IT-security is recommended

modules.name: information_retrieval_and_web_search
recommendedLiterature: Christopher D. Manning, Prabhakar Raghavan and Hinrich Schütze, Introduction to Information Retrieval, Cambridge University Press, 2008.
B. Croft, D. Metzler, T. Strohman, Search Engines: Information Retrieval in Practice, Addison-Wesley, 2009.
R. Baeza-Yates, B. Ribeiro-Neto, Modern Information Retrieval, Addison-Wesley, 2011 (2nd Edition).
modules.additionalPrerequisite: Fundamental notions of linear algebra, probability theory, algorithms and data structures

modules.name: web_data_integration
recommendedLiterature: AnHai Doan, Alon Halevy, Zachary Ives: Principles of Data Integration. Morgan Kaufmann, 2012.
Luna Dong, Divesh Srivastava: Big Data Integration. Morgan & Claypool, 2015.
Ulf Leser, Felix Naumann: Informationsintegration. Dpunkt Verlag, 2007.

modules.name: information_retrieval_project
recommendedLiterature: Christopher D. Manning, Prabhakar Raghavan and Hinrich Schütze, Introduction to Information Retrieval, Cambridge University Press, 2008.
B. Croft, D. Metzler, T. Strohman, Search Engines: Information Retrieval in Practice, Addison-Wesley, 2009.
R. Baeza-Yates, B. Ribeiro-Neto, Modern Information Retrieval, Addison-Wesley, 2011 (2nd Edition).
modules.additionalPrerequisite: Programming skills (preferably in one of the higher-level programming languages: Java/Python/C#/C++).

modules.name: web_data_integration_project
recommendedLiterature: AnHai Doan, Alon Halevy, Zachary Ives: Principles of Data Integration. Morgan Kaufmann, 2012.
Luna Dong, Divesh Srivastava: Big Data Integration. Morgan & Claypool, 2015.
Ulf Leser, Felix Naumann: Informationsintegration. Dpunkt Verlag, 2007.
